    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    Account
    Represents a user account in the theater project system.
    AccountService
    Service class for managing user accounts in the theater system.
    Client
    Represents a client user in the theater project system.
    DummyDataHelper
    Helper class for generating dummy data for testing and development purposes.
    EditorMovieCardController
    Controls the behavior and display of a movie card in the editor interface.
    EditorViewController
     
    LoginViewController
    The LoginViewController class is responsible for managing the login interface and facilitating user authentication in the application.
    MainViewController
    The MainViewController class is responsible for managing the main view of the application.
    Manager
    Represents a manager user in the theater project system.
    Movie
    Represents a movie in the theater project system.
    MovieAddEditViewController
    Controller class for adding or editing a pMovie within a theater management system.
    MovieCardController
    Controller responsible for managing the UI elements and behavior of a movie card in a JavaFX application.
    MovieService
    Service class for managing movies in the theater system.
    NewAccountViewController
    Controller responsible for handling the "Create New Account" view.
    Screening
    The Screening class represents information about a specific movie screening, including the movie being screened, the seat number, and the price of the screening.
    ScreeningAddEditViewController
    Controller for the screening add/edit dialog view.
    Showroom
    Represents a showroom in a theater, containing a name and seating capacity.
    ShowroomAddEditViewController
    Controller for the showroom add/edit dialog view.
    ShowroomCardController
    Controller for displaying and managing individual showroom cards.
    ShowroomService
    Service class for managing showrooms and their screenings in the theater system.
    ShowroomsViewController
    Controller for the showrooms view.
    ShowScreeningsViewController
    Controller responsible for managing the show screenings view.
    StatsViewController
    Controller for the Stats view.
    TheaterApplication
     
    Ticket
    Represents a ticket for a movie screening in the theater project system.
    UIService
    Service for common UI operations.
